strings.dateOfOrientationInputDescription: * Either date of orientation or date of assessment is required.
strings.dateOfAssessmentInputDescription: * If the date of assessment has been entered, the type of assessment id also required
strings.assessmentNumberInputDescription: The number of times that the National Society has gone through PER assessments
strings.branchesInvolvedInputDescription: List the names of the branches that have been involved in the PER process
strings.whatMethodHasThisAssessmentUsedInputLabe: What method has this assessment used
strings.epiConsiderationsInputDescription: Do you want to assess the preparedness of your National Society for epidemics and pandemics?
strings.urbanConsiderationsInputDescription: Do you want to assess the urban aspects of your National Society?
strings.climateAndEnvironmentalConsiderationsInp: Do you want to assess the climate and environment of your National Society?
strings.processCycleInputDescription: The number of times that the National Society has hone through PER assessments
strings.nsFocalPointInputDescription: The focal point will also be automatically assigned to receive reminders and notifications for the final PER work-plan
strings.nsSecondFocalPointInputDescription: The second focal point can be assigned to receive notifications and reminders for the final PER work-plan
strings.submitConfirmMessage: You are about to setup a new PER Process. Once submitted, you can only update some of the fields in this form. You'll be redirected to the Assessment form after the setup is successful.
